title: ollama/ollama
summary: Ollama’s official CLI and server for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other models locally with a single command.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library that wraps the Ollama REST API for easy model inference and chat.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers to talk to a local Ollama server.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration that adds Ollama models as LLM and chat components.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI (formerly Ollama WebUI) for chatting with local models, file uploads, RAG, multi-user.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-built interactive CLI that wraps ollama with chat history, syntax highlighting, and prompts.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Experiment to turn Ollama into a GitHub Copilot-style code-completion service for VS Code.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Simple retrieval-augmented-generation pipeline using Ollama + Sentence-Transformers + Chroma.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that lets a server chat with local Ollama models through slash commands.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that adds a /ollama slash command to query local models from any channel.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart for deploying Ollama server and models on Kubernetes clusters.

title: ollama-operator
summary: Kubernetes operator that manages Ollama instances and model CRDs across namespaces.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java / Kotlin client library for Ollama with reactive and blocking APIs.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing an async client for the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama with support for chat, completion, and embeddings endpoints.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger (CUE) module that spins up Ollama containers in CI pipelines for testing LLM calls.

title: ollama-naptha
summary: Browser-extension that offloads LLM inference to a local Ollama instance for private web assistants.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or chatters in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-rag-stack
summary: Starter template combining Ollama, FastAPI, React, Chroma, and LangChain for out-of-box RAG apps.

title: ollama-model-gallery
summary: Curated community repo of Modelfile recipes and quantized GGUFs ready for ollama pull.
